external_games.name: Super Luigi and the Golden Shrooms

name: Super Luigi and the Golden Shrooms
storyline: There are lots of golden mushrooms scattered all over the Mushroom Kingdom. When all of them are collected, they function as a key, allowing you into a vault filled with riches. Unfortunately, these mushrooms are scattered everywhere, so collecting them will be a long and difficult task. Luckily, Luigi has plenty of free time, so he heads off in search of these mushrooms.
summary:
Super Luigi and the Golden Shrooms is an unofficial freeware fan game starring Luigi from the Mario series.

Luigi needs to explore many different areas to find and collect golden mushrooms. There are lots of golden mushrooms scattered all over the Mushroom Kingdom. When all of them are collected, they function as a key, allowing you into a vault filled with riches. Unfortunately, these mushrooms are scattered everywhere, so collecting them will be a long and difficult task. Luckily, Luigi has plenty of free time, so he heads off in search of these mushrooms.
